4315570.name: OKEverything X Myth: Super Sexy Fairy - DLC Live Stream Doomsday Carnival
4315570.description:
OKEverything X Myth: Super Sexy Fairy - DLC Live Stream Doomsday Carnival - An Immersive Visual Interactive Novel. This DLC is a side story to "OKEverything X Myth: Super Sexy Fairy".

Story Introduction

  • In 2027, a gray-black dust shrouds the ruined city, and the plague of oblivion has raged for eighteen months. Survivors must rely on livestreaming to garner attention and slow their memory loss. You are Volpert, a second-tier livestreamer, your popularity dwindling, your memory index reduced to only 37%, and you could become a walking corpse at any moment. During an adventure, you encounter a severely infected, amnesiac girl. Her appearance causes a surge in viewership for your livestream, but it also draws you into a battle for viewership among top livestreamers, a dark conspiracy within the military, and the apocalyptic judgment of the infected leader. Lies and truth intertwine, survival and conscience clash. Will you succumb to the allure of false popularity and survive, or will you tear down the mask of revelry and seek redemption?

Female Character Introduction

  • Amnesiac Girl Lily: From innocent dependence to awakening memories, will you maintain the "autumn angel" persona to attract fans, or help her uncover the truth and confront hatred? "Top Streamer Susie": A hypocritical adversary behind a sophisticated utopia. Will you ally with her to suppress competitors or tear down her facade to reveal the truth? Interactions are filled with hidden traffic traps and plot twists.

  • Military Researcher Rachel: A mysterious trading partner. Her special medicine and data collection hide a shocking secret. Will you trust and cooperate for survival, or remain vigilant and uncover the conspiracy?

  • Infected Leader Beth: A cold and powerful post-apocalyptic queen. Her gaze is constant throughout the story. Confronting her will uncover the source of the plague. Interactions are filled with danger and the possibility of redemption.

Scene Features

  • Ruined City: Dilapidated office buildings, abandoned supermarkets, and sealed-off hospitals—each scene hides survival resources and the crisis of infection. The meticulously detailed post-apocalyptic landscape creates an immersive sense of oppression.

  • Livestream Battlefield: The stark contrast between the frenzied chat in the livestream room and the life-or-death struggle in reality creates a unique visual and psychological impact through the collision of virtual traffic and real survival.

  • Underground Chamber: A dark and damp secret hideout where fragments of memory are pieced together, truth and lies intertwine, creating a suspenseful atmosphere of exploration.

Classic Gameplay Features

Unique Gameplay: Interactive visual novel game

Playable in short bursts: Start anytime, rewind and replay supported
